result.arabic_text: ٱنفِرُواْ خِفَافٗا وَثِقَالٗا وَجَٰهِدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنفُسِكُمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: Salphoo taatanii yookiin ulfaatoo[] taataniis duulaaf bahaa; Qabeenyaaleefi lubbuulee keessaniin karaa Rabbii keessatti lolaa. kanatu isiniif caalaadha, Yoo kan beektan taatan.
result.footnotes: [1]Salphoofi ulfaatoo jechuun: Haala hunda keessattuu dargaggeessas taatanii jaarsa, qabaataas taatanii dhabaa, dadhabaas taatanii danda’aa, dhukkubsataas taatanii fayyaa jechuudha. Kuni yeroo jalqabaatiif ture; booda garuu keeyyata “warra hin dandeenye irra badiin hin jiru” jedhuun shaarameera.
